turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you order me a Starbucks espresso coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you please speak into the mic.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me a Starbucks espresso coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of drink did u want from starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any milk for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you make it regular milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can you make it with no sugar? Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you mean whole milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a large, iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hot or iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want a venti iced espresso with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes, can you add no sugar on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: venti iced espresso with whole milk and no sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.30 is your total.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And I will be there to.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks 4th street in colorado springs. it should be ready for pick up in about 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you. No, that's a deal.
